142660.「<pc>。\n 私に 何かしてほしいことは あるかしら？\n<break>:
<pc>. Is there anything you would
like me to do for you?
<break>

142675.「<pc>。私が作った 妖精の苗木は\n 手伝ってくれる内容に応じて ５種類ある:
. There are five types of fairy saplings that I made, depending on what you want to help me with. First of all, please
choose "Get a sapling".

142676.「あなたに手伝ってほしいのは 『おうえんする』\n 『モンスターをなでる』『おひ:
There are 5 different types of help that we need you to do: Egg On, Stroke the Monster, Turnover, Emote, and Chat. Each sapling
produces 5 fruits, so you will get 25 fruits if you do all 5 types of help. I will give you a reward in exchange for the berries, so if
you want to get a lot of rewards, please help me with all five. Also, "emote" and "chat" are two of the pre-scheduled times. Please note
that you will not be able to participate in these two after the time has passed. You can check the time in the "Explanation" section.

142677.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「それじゃ ない:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Not that one! If you don't want me to tickle
your armpits, you'll have to be more serious!

142679.「ほかに 何か私にしてほしいことは ある？\n<break>:
Is there anything else you'd like me to do?
<break>

142680.「それじゃ 手伝ってくれるものを 教えて？\n 内容に対応した 苗木を渡すわ。\:
Okay, then, tell me what you're going to help
me with? I'll give you the saplings
corresponding to the content.
<break>

142681.「チャットを してきてくれるのね。\n こっちでは チャットって\n コミュニケ:
You've been chatting with me, haven't you? Chatting is a form of communication over here, right? I think it would be fun and happy if we
all gather in the same place to chat. That's why we decided on a time and place for it.

142682.「この中から 好きな時間を １回選んで\n <%sM_STAGE>で\n チャッ:
You can choose any one of these times and chat with us at <%sM_STAGE>! You can say either "<%sM_CHAT1>" or "<%sM_CHAT2>". You can say
either "<%sM_CHAT1>" or "<%sM_CHAT2>", but be careful, because you have to say it with the "Nearby" setting.

142683.「チャットを１回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
Once you have achieved one chat and the fairy
sapling has five fruits, talk to Nora from
Slime there and harvest the fruits.

142684.「あら……？\n あなたは すでに苗木を持っているわよ？: Oh...? You already have a sapling, don't you?

142685.「あら そう。やめるのね。\n 何をすれば 今 持っている苗木が成長するかは\n:
Oh, yeah. You're quitting. You can check the Key Items to see what you need to do to make your sapling grow, and if you want to know
when to hold the chat with the emote, you can use the fairy sapling from the Key Items or go to "Explanation".

142686.※テキスト削除\n「それに その苗木……実が５つなってるようよ！\n ５つ 実を:
The sapling with five fruits is ready for harvest, so talk to Nora at Slime and try to harvest them. I will reward you in exchange
for the fruits you collect. When you're done harvesting, talk to me again and choose "Exchange Fruits for Gratitude".

142687.「オーケー！ わかったわ。\n じゃあ 今 あなたが持っている苗木は\n 私が:
Okay! Okay. Then I'll throw away the saplings
you're holding right now.

142688.「それに その苗木は成長させてる途中のようね？\n 今 持っている苗木を\n 別:
And the sapling looks like it's in the process of growing? Would it be okay if I just replace the sapling I have with another sapling?
However, any fruit on the sapling will disappear, so think carefully. Would you like to trade it for another sapling?

142689.「なでるのね。こっちでは 仲間モンスターを\n なでられると 幸せな気持ちになれ:
Stroke. Over here, if you stroke your companion monster, it makes you happy, right? So, stroke someone's monster five times. But
don't stroke the same person's monster more than once. And don't stroke your own monster. You have to deliver happiness to 5 different
people!

142690.「なでるのを５回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
When you have achieved five strokes and your
fairy sapling has five fruits, talk to Nora
from Slime there and harvest the fruits.
<bw_break>

142692.「おひねりをしてくるのね わかったわ。\n トップ１０掲示板で おひねりをされる:
You're going to make me a treat. Okay, I get it. You're happy when you get a treat on the Top 10 board, aren't you? Well... go ahead and
make a nice gift to any post you like, no matter how much it costs. You only have to do it once. Besides, I heard that message boards
can make you happy just by looking at them. How about it? Will you help me to make a turnover?

142693.「おひねりをしてくるのね わかったわ。\n トップ１０掲示板で おひねりされると:
You're going to make me a treat. Okay, I get it. I get it. You get a nice treat on the Top 10 board and it makes you happy, right? But
then I see you've already made a bribe. Then I'll give you this sapling!

142694.酒場や町の入り口にある 『まちかど掲示板』に\nアクセスして みんなのお知らせ広:
Access the "Town Bulletin Board" located in the tavern or at the entrance to the town and contribute to the Top 10 Bulletin Board posts
from everyone's Notification Square.

142695.「おひねりを１回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
When you have achieved one twist and your
fairy sapling has five fruits, talk to Slime's
Nora there and harvest the fruits.

142696.「その苗木は すでに 収穫できる状態だから\n スライムのノラに話しかけて 収穫:
The saplings are already ready for harvest, so talk to Nora at Slime and harvest them. I will reward you in exchange for the fruit you
collect.

142697.「おうえんね。こっちでは おうえんされると\n 幸せな気持ちに なれるんでしょ？:
Egg On. Egg On's make us happy here, right? So, go Egg On someone 5 times, not only those who are fighting, but also those who are
fishing or those who are working hard in the craftsmen's guild! However... you can't Egg On the same person more than once. Happiness must
be delivered to 5 different people! How about it? Would you like to help me Egg On?

142698.「おうえんを５回達成して 妖精の苗木に実が５つ\n ついた状態になったら そこの:
Once you have achieved Egg On five times and
the fairy sapling has five fruits, talk to
Nora from Slime there and harvest the fruits.

142699.「しぐさをするのね わかったわ。\n こっちでは しぐさって\n コミュニケーシ:
You do "emote". I get it. I understand that over here, "emote" is a form of communication, right? I think it's fun and happy when
everyone gathers at the same place to emote. That's why we decided on a time and place for it.

142700.特定のしぐさを おこないたい場合は\nさくせんコマンドの いろいろ設定の\nよく:

fairy sapling has five fruits, talk to Nora

142714.「この中から 好きな時間を １回選んで\n <%sM_STAGE>で\n 『まわ:

142715.「みんなに 幸せを届けて\n 苗木を成長させたら いよいよ 収穫よ！\n<br>:
After bringing happiness to everyone and making the saplings grow, it's time to harvest! I will reward you in exchange for the
fruits you collect.

142716.「あなたに渡す妖精の苗木は 皆の幸せな気持ちで\n 成長し 実をつけていく特別な:
The fairy sapling I'm giving you is a special sapling that will grow and bear fruit because of everyone's happiness. I made them with my
own magic. There are five types of saplings, depending on what you help me with. Make the people around you happy and make the saplings
grow. Each sapling produces 5 fruits, so if you do all 5 types of help, you will get 25 fruits. I will give you a reward in exchange
for the berries, so if you want to get a lot of rewards, help me with all five. To find out what you need to do to make the fairy saplings
grow, check your Key Items.

142717.「しぐさは あらかじめ\n 開催時間が 決まっているわ。: The emote has a prearranged time.
